trans-unit.source: Provides access to get and set option values for a designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso a obter e definir valores de opção para um estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa a edição no local para <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if in-place editing for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se no local para a edição <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> controlos está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa as dimensões de uma unidade de grelha.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa as dimensões de uma unidade de grelha.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se um designer mostra painel de etiquetas inteligentes de um componente automaticamente na criação.

trans-unit.source: A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Painel de etiquetas inteligentes de um componente está definido como abrir automaticamente quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para permitir que o painel de etiquetas inteligentes de um componente para abrir automaticamente após a criação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the grid in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa a grelha no designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a grelha; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables whether controls are automatically placed at grid coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa se controlos são automaticamente colocados em coordenadas de grelha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snapping is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se está ativado o ajuste; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa a cache de componente.

trans-unit.source: The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers.
trans-unit.target: A cache do componente é um melhoramento de desempenho que é incompatível com determinadas designers.

trans-unit.source: You can disable it with this property.
trans-unit.target: Pode desativá-lo com esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cache de componente está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables smart tags in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa as etiquetas inteligentes no designer.

trans-unit.source: This option is not exposed on the **Options** item of the **Tools** menu in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esta opção não está exposta no **opções** item do **ferramentas** menu no [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart tags in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiverem ativadas etiquetas inteligentes no designer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables snaplines in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que ativa ou desativa snaplines no designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if snaplines in the designer are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiverem ativadas snaplines no designer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
